meanings.definition: A type of gull that nests on cliffs.
meanings.sent1: The kittiwakes soared gracefully over the cliffs.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of kittiwakes nesting on the rocky cliffs.
meanings.sent3: The kittiwakes decided to have a cliffside picnic.
meanings.sent4: The kittiwakes perched on the cliffs like white clouds.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the kittiwakes echoed off the cliff walls.

meanings.definition: The white and gray plumage of a kittiwake.
meanings.sent1: The kittiwakes' feathers were a beautiful mix of white and gray.
meanings.sent2: I admired the soft hues of the kittiwakes' plumage.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer was inspired by the kittiwakes' color palette.
meanings.sent4: Her scarf resembled the kittiwakes' delicate plumage.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of the kittiwakes' feathers in her painting.

meanings.definition: To observe kittiwakes in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent1: We planned to kittiwakes watch during our nature hike.
meanings.sent2: Let's go kittiwakes spotting along the coast.
meanings.sent3: She enjoys kittiwakes watching as a relaxing hobby.
meanings.sent4: Kittiwakes observing brings peace to my mind.
meanings.sent5: I find joy in kittiwakes observing their playful antics.
